abstract: Honolulu City Council overrides Mayor Kirk Caldwell's veto on expansion of city law banning sitting and lying down in certain areas; Caldwell claims expansion may appear to target homeless people, raising possible legal challenges.
lead_paragraph: The Honolulu City Council on Wednesday overrode Mayor Kirk Caldwell’s veto of a recent bill to expand the ban on sitting and lying down to additional parts of Honolulu.

headline.main: Hawaii: Despite Veto, Honolulu Expands Ban on Sitting and Lying Down
headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Despite Veto, Honolulu Expands Ban on Sitting and Lying Down

snippet: The Honolulu City Council on Wednesday overrode Mayor Kirk Caldwell’s veto of a recent bill to expand the ban on sitting and lying down to additional parts of Honolulu.
